report_reason_title: WHAT DO YOU WANT TO REPORT?
message_delete_hint: Really want to delete this message?
block_dialog_content: After blocking, you will no longer receive messages from ${userName}.
user_blocked_hint: User is blocked, tap to unblock
create_group_select_toast: Please select at least one user
select_at_least_one_member: Please select at least one member
create_group_fail_tips: Failed to create group chat. Please check if the other party has used a client that supports NostrMLS.
no_available_keypackages_content: Not available key packages. Invite your friend(s) to connect?
edit_group_name_not_empty_toast: The group name cannot be empty
remove_member_confirm_content: Are you sure you want to remove {count} member(s) from the group?
no_sessions_description: Tap the + button in the top right corner to start a new chat.
delete_message_me_and_other_action_mode: Request to delete for me and ${otherName}
other_client_keypackages_warning: Warning: These key packages are from other clients. Communication may not work properly.
create_secret_chat_confirm_content: Are you sure you want to start a new private chat and send an invitation to the other person?
delete_group_confirm_content: This action will permanently delete the group and cannot be undone. All group data will be lost.
leave_group_confirm_content: You will no longer receive messages from this group and will need to be re-invited to rejoin.
leave_group_title: Are you sure you want to leave ${chatName}?
leave_and_delete_group_title: Are you sure you want to leave and delete ${chatName}?
delete_self_chat_content: This will delete the chat from your device.
delete_for_me_content: This will only delete the chat from your device. The other person will still have the conversation.
delete_for_all_content: This will attempt to delete the chat for both you and ${userName}. They may not see the messages anymore.
clear_history_content: This action will delete all message history but keep the conversation.
delete_group_content: Deleting this group will remove all members and all messages will be lost. Do you want to delete the group?
leave_group_content: You will no longer receive messages from this group and will need to be re-invited to rejoin.
gift_wrapped_message_warning: This message is not a gift-wrapped message.
not_allowed_push_own_detail: Not allowed push own detail page
invite_private_chat: ${userName} invite you to join the private chat
invite_private_group: ${userName} invite you to join the private group
removed_from_group: You have been removed from the group
tech_intro_content_1: Your messages are protected by advanced MLS encryption technology, ensuring only you and your conversation partners can read them.
tech_intro_content_2: Unlike traditional messaging apps, the relays that store messages can be freely chosen and deployed, with minimal metadata collection.
tech_intro_content_3: Your identity and messages are secured using cryptographic keys that only you control, giving you complete privacy and security.
tech_intro_feature_1_desc: All messages are encrypted on your device before being sent, ensuring complete privacy.
tech_intro_feature_2_desc: No single company or server controls your data - you maintain full control.
tech_intro_feature_3_desc: Even if your device is compromised, past messages remain secure.
tech_intro_feature_4_desc: Your files are encrypted on your device before transmission, and servers cannot decrypt your files.
tech_intro_delete_1_desc: Only removes messages from your device
tech_intro_delete_2_desc: Deletes local messages and notifies the other party, who will also delete the message upon receiving
tech_intro_delete_3_desc: Group owner deletes the message and notifies all members, who will all delete the message upon receiving
tech_intro_delete_4_desc: Group owner deletes the group and notifies all members, who will all delete the group chat upon receiving
